sen.e: So, there was concern that the rapid urbanization, such as the construction of high-rise condominium buildings, might be the cause for destroying valuable borrowed landscapes.

sen.e: For that purpose, Kyoto City established Landscape Policy (its official name is a Vistaed View Creation Ordinance) to conserve borrowed landscapes, such as the Entsu-ji Temple Garden.
